verbs.description: [ARG0: Canada 's finance minister] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Friday] [ARG1: he is hopeful the threat of retaliation against U.S. trade measures will persuade the Trump administration to back away from the steel and aluminum tariffs it has imposed on its G7 allies] .
